meanings.definition: A member of a group of artists known as neoplasticists.
meanings.sent1: The neoplasticists gathered to discuss their latest art exhibition.
meanings.sent2: Many neoplasticists are inspired by geometric shapes and primary colors.
meanings.sent3: The neoplasticists decided to paint the town red, quite literally!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a canvas, painted by the neoplasticists of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The neoplasticists' studio was a vibrant hub of artistic innovation.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of neoplasticists.
meanings.sent1: She admired the neoplasticists style of art for its bold use of color.
meanings.sent2: The gallery featured a collection of neoplasticists paintings.
meanings.sent3: The neoplasticists-inspired room was a symphony of shapes and hues.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were a neoplasticists puzzle, intricate and mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The garden was transformed into a neoplasticists paradise of form and color.
